question: You notice you can save funds by firing the school psychiatrist.
A teacher tells you that one her studens is acting very depressed and that a school should hire a new psychiatrist.
One of the students complaied the gym teacher is always yelling on all the students.
Teacher got sick and there is no substitute.
Teacher is back from sick leave.
A student wants to teach others instead of a teacher for a class.
You hear that a student is constantly getting verbal abuse from others.
The student from has been beaten up.
One of the student come to you and said that there are bullying in her class but teacher pretends not to care because bullers are popular kids.
leftText: Talk with the teacher about the situation.

question: One student gives you an idea to participate in a contest to win partial funding for gym reniewal.
leftText: There are other people who need these money more.

question: You come to talk to art teacher during club activity and saw some students drawing intensly.
leftText: You got an idea to make their work exhibition in school.

question: You hear two teachers gossip bad about you because of the accident when you scolded a teacher that didn't see the bullying.
leftText: You walk in on them and ask to talk about it face to face.
rightText: You walk away and plan all teacher meeting with psychologist about bullying.

question: A student parent came to you saying that her child often cames back crying because her teacher recently became often angry and yells at her and her classmates.
leftText: You call said teacher and talk about it.

question: You got a letter from Board of Education that there are teachers who complain about you.
leftText: You assemble all the teachers and tell them about the current situation.
rightText: You assemble all the teachers and talk with them about the current situation.

question: You notice one of the teachers isn't doing his job correctly, but the student body respects and adores him.
